DOC.detailed_description: This study investigate efficacy exercise counsel intervention depress smoker ( depression subscale Hospital Anxiety Depression Scale , HADS-D score ≥ 8 ) term likelihood smoking abstinence . Participants randomize 8 week group deliver exercise counseling ( smoke cessation physical activity ) health education contact control condition . The investigator assess intervention randomize control trial 96 depressed adult smoker recruit advertisement local print allocate one two group ( intervention group vs. control group ) 8-week period 3 follow-up visit ( 12 , 24 , 52 week baseline ) . All subject ( intervention control group ) participate smoke cessation program compose pharmacological treatment ( include nicotine replacement therapy varenicline ) counseling.Experimental group subject require attend 2 supervise exercise session 2 counsel session Week 1 Week 2 . Supervised exercise counseling session realize successively . For Week 3 8 , participant require attend 1 supervised exercise session 1 counseling session plus 1 home exercise session.Supervized exercise session consist 5-min warm-up , 30 min aerobic activity ( stationary bike ) , 5-min cooldown stretching . The training intensity 60 80 % maximum heart rate . The session supervise exercise specialist verify documented heart rate . Home exercise session consist 45 min aerobic exercise ( walking , cycling , run ) . The training intensity 6 7 breathlessness visual analog scale.The smoke counseling session include follow component : review participant 's smoke history motivation quit , help identification high-risk situation , management cigarette crave generation problem-solving strategy deal situations.Exercise counsel session design motivate increase regular physical activity short bout exercise response negative affect urge smoke . The goal intervention increase activity level.Health education group subject require participate 75-minute supervised session frequency experimental group . Participants health education condition receive information variety health topic include sleep hygiene , nutrition , stress health screening test cancer prevention . Participants also ask read handout health education topic cover session .
